Accordingly, title 24 of the Code of Federal Regulations, parts 44, 45, 85, 207, 213, 221, 232, 236, 242, 277, 280, 570, 575, 576, 577, 578, 579, 880, 881, 883, 884, 885, and 886, Implementation of OMB Circular A-133 ``Audits of Institutions of Higher Education and Other Nonprofit Institutions'', is amended by adopting as final the interim rule, published in the
Federal Register
on July 27, 1992 at 57 FR 33252, and is further amended with the following revisions to parts 92, 572, 881, 889, and 890, to read as follows:
PART 92_HOME INVESTMENT PARTNERSHIPS PROGRAM
1. The authority for part 92 continues to read as follows:
Authority:
2. Section 92.506 is revised to read as follows:
Audit.
Audits of the participating jurisdiction and subrecipients must be conducted in accordance with 24 CFR parts 44 and 45, as applicable.
3. Section 92.646 is revised to read as follows:
Audit.
Audits of the Indian tribe and subrecipients must be conducted in accordance with 24 CFR parts 44 and 45, as applicable.
PART 572_HOPE FOR HOMEOWNERSHIP OF SINGLE FAMILY HOMES PROGRAM (HOPE 3)
4. The authority for part 572 continues to read as follows:
Authority:
5. In §572.420, the last sentence of paragraph (a)(1) is revised to read as follows:
Miscellaneous requirements.

(1) *␣*␣*Recipients are also subject to the audit requirements of OMB Circular A-128 (Audits of State and Local Governments) implemented at 24 CFR part 44, and OMB Circular A-133 (Audits of Institutions of Higher Learning and Other Nonprofit Institutions), implemented at 24 CFR part 45, as applicable.
PART 881_SECTION 8 HOUSING ASSISTANCE PAYMENTS PROGRAM FOR SUBSTANTIAL REHABILITATION
6. The authority for part 881 is revised to read as follows:
Authority:
7. In §881.211, paragraph (b) is revised to read as follows:
Audit.
(b) Where a nonprofit organization is the eligible owner of a project, receiving financial assistance under this part, the audit requirements in 24 CFR part 45 shall apply.
PART 889_SUPPORTIVE HOUSING FOR THE ELDERLY
8. The authority for part 889 continues to read as follows:
Authority:
9. Part 889 is amended to add a new §889.280 to subpart B, to read as follows:
Audit requirements.
Nonprofits receiving assistance under this part are subject to the audit requirements in 24 CFR part 45.
PART 890_SUPPORTIVE HOUSING FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES
10. The authority for part 890 continues to read as follows:
Authority:

Audit requirements.
Nonprofits receiving assistance under this part are subject to the audit requirements in 24 CFR part 45.
Dated: December 21, 1993.
